title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set.
description: The current behavior is not displaying the group dialog when the data set is not set.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the data set, attempting to create a new table group does not display the group dialog.
EB: The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a table report item without setting the data set.
2. Try creating a new table group.
